  Learning new things daily

.Text Lives (sort of)

If you are seeing this post, it means you are visiting my new home on the Intertubes – ScottW.com.

I have owned ScottW.com for a while, so I figured it was time to actually put it to use. Since I was going to make a change, I figured I would take the time to clean some things up and simplify the site.

  1. I removed a bunch of posts which are no longer relevant (example: open positions). I am going to try to push content that is date sensitive over to my tumblr blog.
  2. The site is now generated by Jekyll, powered by Rack-Jekyll, and hosted on Heroku. This means I can write it in a simple text editor and then publish it easily via git.
  3. I am going without comments for now. If you have questions or comments you can email me at scottwater@gmail.com or use the ask feature on Tumblr.
  4. Blog posts about blogs are lame, so I am going to stop here. I really just wanted to callout the new url and apologize for unread posts you may be seeing in your aggregator. Sorry. :(

If you want to see how it is all put together and works, you can grab a copy of it from my git repository.

Posted on Apr 07, 2010
